ext_descriptions.ext_description: The condition evaluation MIM provides the resources to support the evaluation record information requirments.
An evaluation_record is a record of the results and values of evaluating an expression.
A condition_assertion is a record of the result of evaluating a condition. The conclusion of asserting a condition is based on the result of the relevant criterion.
A criterion_assertion is a record of teh result of evaluating a criterion.
A parameter_record is a record of a parameter value used in the evaluation of a criterion.
